whyClientsChoose.name: Why Clients Choose Korn Ferry
whyClientsChoose.description: This analysis identifies key themes explaining why clients choose Korn Ferry, focusing on positive factors, competitive advantages, and selection criteria.

themes.label: Trusted Relationships and Expertise
themes.description: Clients value long-standing relationships with Korn Ferry consultants, built on trust, expertise, and familiarity with their business needs.

supportingQuotes.text: I tend to go to Korn Ferry because I actually like the people... they know me, I haven't got to be on my best behaviour when I talk.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.

supportingQuotes.text: Anywhere Chris went, I would go.

interviewIds: Paul Lester, Hudson Advisors UK Ltd.
Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Delivery
themes.description: Korn Ferry consistently delivers high-caliber candidates, meeting or exceeding client expectations in terms of quality and fit.

supportingQuotes.text: They were very successful in finding the right candidate to meet our needs.
The candidate quality repeatedly exceeded expectations.

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Clients appreciate Korn Ferry's structured communication, regular updates, and responsiveness to feedback throughout the engagement.

supportingQuotes.text: Communication is always absolutely stand out... we are in regular communication with Hilary and the team on the project.
Greg scheduled by monthly calls with the team... to give us updates, to share... additional context on the candidates.

interviewIds: Claire Van Coberen, ASML Netherlands BV
Lesley Dwyer, Norfolk and Norwich University Hospital

themes.label: Flexibility and Adaptability
themes.description: Korn Ferry demonstrates flexibility in adapting to client needs, whether in terms of engagement terms, process adjustments, or addressing specific challenges.

supportingQuotes.text: Korn Ferry has been very good about working with us on those... It's that fine balance... and Korn Ferry has been very good about providing the flexibility that we need.
They were always slightly in between... in principle, they have been negotiating the package on the basis, of course, of what we told them.

themes.label: Deep Market and Sector Knowledge
themes.description: Clients choose Korn Ferry for their deep understanding of specific industries and markets, which enhances candidate sourcing and alignment.

supportingQuotes.text: They knew our business, they knew the nuts and bolts of our business, and they also understood the culture that we had.
She understands the healthcare business extremely well and she's really buttoned up on this.

interviewIds: Dr. Jan Stefan Scheld, Boehringer Ingelheim
Lesley Dwyer, Norfolk and Norwich University Hospital

promoterExperience.name: The Promoter Experience
promoterExperience.description: This theme category explores the key factors that contribute to exceptional experiences and strong satisfaction among promoters working with Korn Ferry, focusing on what they value most in their engagements.

themes.label: Tailored and Thoughtful Approach
themes.description: Promoters value Korn Ferry's ability to tailor their approach to meet specific client needs, demonstrating a deep understanding of the client's business and culture.

supportingQuotes.text: What really swung the success of Korn Ferry's pitches is that they really take the time to ask thoughtful questions.
They had a better understanding of what we were looking for... they tailored the search to what we really wanted.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

interviewIds: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

themes.label: Strong Relationship Management
themes.description: Promoters appreciate the strong, trust-based relationships with Korn Ferry consultants, which are often built on long-term engagement and personal rapport.

supportingQuotes.text: We just hit it off based on shared beliefs around talent and culture... I trust him with my business.
It's just so easy, really, like, they're just part of our own ASML talent organization.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Claire Van Coberen, ASML Netherlands BV

interviewIds: Claire Van Coberen, ASML Netherlands BV

themes.label: High-Quality Candidate Delivery
themes.description: Promoters consistently highlight the quality and alignment of candidates presented by Korn Ferry, which often exceed expectations.

supportingQuotes.text: They were very successful in finding the right candidate to meet our needs.
The candidate quality repeatedly exceeded expectations.

themes.label: Responsive and Proactive Communication
themes.description: Promoters value Korn Ferry's consistent and proactive communication, which keeps them informed and engaged throughout the process.

supportingQuotes.text: Communication is always absolutely stand out... we are in regular communication.
Greg scheduled by monthly calls with the team... to give us updates, to share... additional context on the candidates.

themes.label: Flexibility and Adaptability
themes.description: Promoters appreciate Korn Ferry's flexibility in adapting to client needs, whether in terms of engagement terms, process adjustments, or candidate presentation.

supportingQuotes.text: Korn Ferry has been very good about working with us on those... It's that fine balance.
Korn Ferry have terms and conditions they absolutely have to meet, but I've really appreciated the flexibility.

whereFallsShort.name: Where the Experience Falls Short
whereFallsShort.description: This category identifies areas where Korn Ferry's service delivery did not meet client expectations, highlighting challenges and opportunities for improvement.

themes.label: Diversity and Inclusion Gaps
themes.description: Clients noted a lack of gender diversity in candidate slates and all-male consulting teams, impacting perception and satisfaction.

supportingQuotes.text: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
All the consultants from Korn Ferry were all men... it didn't really sit very well.

themes.label: Compensation and Negotiation Challenges
themes.description: Clients experienced difficulties obtaining compensation information and felt Korn Ferry lacked assertiveness in negotiation support.

supportingQuotes.text: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
I would have expected a little bit more of support... I would have appreciated a little bit more of challenging behaviour versus the candidate.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gerd Pircher and Marco Trovo, HSBC Continental Europe, Italy

supportingQuotes.text: Being treated like that makes me not want to work with them again.

interviewIds: Gerd Pircher and Marco Trovo, HSBC Continental Europe, Italy

themes.label: Communication and Coordination Issues
themes.description: Clients reported issues with late delivery of materials, unclear communication, and coordination lapses affecting confidence.

supportingQuotes.text: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

supportingQuotes.text: They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.

interviewIds: Duffield Ashmead IV, Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art

themes.label: Candidate Sourcing and Quality Concerns
themes.description: Clients expressed dissatisfaction with the breadth and originality of candidate sourcing, expecting more diverse and high-caliber options.

supportingQuotes.text: They didn't really generate the level of the candidates that we thought they should have.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

supportingQuotes.text: There weren't really people who weren't on our radar that made you think, wow, that's amazing.
supportingQuotes.interviewId: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

interviewIds: Gary Knell, San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

themes.label: Assertiveness and Leadership in Process
themes.description: Clients felt Korn Ferry lacked assertiveness and leadership in guiding the search process and making recommendations.

supportingQuotes.text: We ended up running the calls.
It just wasn't assertive enough.
